title: (x) Hellboy closing credits - H&FJ Knockout {Adriano S}
content: hello, can someone please let me know waht the orange closing credits type for hellboy is? maybe i’m stupid, but i don’t know it. i think it’s really nice. ok, thanx - sye :)
author: varultz

comments.content:
Do you have a sample? I seem to remember it being something like [Univers Ultra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126221420/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108137.0.20&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=GUILLERMO+DEL+TORO&sampleSize=48), but that’s just a guess.

- Lex

unfortunatly i cannot get a clean sample as i’m using a iMac G3 500MHz with os x 10.3.9 and i can’t find a way to capture the credits. when i try it just gives me a blank screen.

here are some really low-res pics taken with my phone… i know they are bad but it’s the best i can do… sorry…

[http://www.varultz.com/hellboy\_closing\_credits.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126221420/http:/www.varultz.com/hellboy_closing_credits.jpg)

- sye :)

It could be [  
 target="\_blank"\>  
 target=”\_blank”\>H&FJ Knockout Junior Featherweight](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126221420/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko28.html).

Varultz

Down VLC media player. You can take screenshots of DVD’s with that.

I think you’ve got it with Knockout, but it looks closer to [KO 47](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126221420/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko47.html) to me.

- Lex
thank you very much! i think they are both used. again thanx heaps - sye :)

ok, [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126221420/http:/www.varultz.com/hellboy_closing_credits_hi.jpg) is a high res pic, just for confirmation. thanx for the vlc player suggestion, it worked great. ok, byebye - sye :)
